Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Droid Directory is a department within the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 magazine published by De Agostini. Each issue contains one or two articles within the department which cover in-universe details about a droid model or type. While most information is canon, some articles contain specifically labelled sections of Star Wars Legends information.

Explore how R2-D2 fits into a Star Wars universe packed with droids built for every conceivable purpose, from providing medical care to waging war. Beyond their appearance in the movies, discover their functional features through blueprints, specification sheets and a comprehensive technical analysis.
